FuncDef:
The set vlan-statistics subinterface enable command enables PPPoE statistics collection on a QinQ interface.
The undo set vlan-statistics subinterface enable command restores the default configuration.
By default, PPPoE statistics collection is disabled on a QinQ interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check PPPoE statistics on a QinQ interface, run the set vlan-statistics subinterface enable command to enable PPPoE statistics collection on the QinQ interface. Alternatively, you can load the PAF file to enable this function. After the PAF file is loaded, PPPoE statistics collection takes effect regardless of whether the set vlan-statistics subinterface enable command is run.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
